actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to prohibit commercial fishing in the waters located in the national seashore recreation areas.

summary.text: Prohibits fishing, other than sport fishing, in the waters located in the national seashore recreation areas. Provides for a fine of not more than $5,000 for each day on which a person engages in such fishing in violation of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit commercial fishing in the waters located in the national seashore recreation areas.
